message_templates.name: Small Drip Detected (4 - Smallest)
message_templates.friendly_description: On ##INCIDENT_DATE_TIME##, a small drip was detected during your Health Test. Don’t panic - it’s likely a running toilet or faucet that wasn’t closed all the way. Check all the fixtures in your house and make sure they're tightly closed and have proper sealing.

Items.extra_info: Unplug the power connection to the Flo device.  Wait 15 seconds and reconnect power.  If this error persists, please contact Flo Support.
Items.name: Temperature Sensor Error
Items.friendly_description: your Flo device detected that there is a temporary error with the Flo system. Flo will not take any action on your behalf, and recommends you investigate and troubleshoot this potential issue as soon as possible.

Items.extra_info: Unplug the power connection to the Flo device.  Wait 15 seconds and reconnect power.  If this error persists, please contact Flo Support.
Items.name: Temperature Sensor Error
Items.friendly_description: your Flo device detected that there is a temporary error with the Flo system. Flo will not take any action on your behalf, and recommends you investigate and troubleshoot this potential issue as soon as possible.

Items.extra_info: Perform a visual inspection around your home including all appliances and plumbing related fixtures to check for signs of a leak. Other potential causes of this alarm can be unexpected heavy water usage events. If you have any questions, please contact Flo Support.
Items.name: Flow Totalization Limit (Daily)
Items.friendly_description: your Flo device detected that your home water flowed more gallons in one day than the expected amount. If you don’t take action now, your Flo Device will shut off your water in 5 minutes.

Items.extra_info: Perform a visual inspection around your home including all appliances and plumbing related fixtures to check for signs of a leak.  If there are no signs of a leak please confirm that your Flo system was properly set to Away mode. Other potential causes of this alarm can be unexpected heave water usage events.  If you have any questions, please contact Flo Support.
Items.name: Flow Totalization Limit (Daily)
Items.friendly_description: your Flo device detected that your home water flowed more gallons in one day than the expected amount. Flo has shut off your water on your behalf.

Items.extra_info: The cause of this potential leak can be determined by performing a visual inspection of the areas around your moisture sensors.  If there are no obvious signs of a leak or if you have any questions, please contact Flo Support.
Items.name: Floor Moisture Detection Positive
Items.friendly_description: your Flo device detected floor moisture. Flo has shut off your water on your behalf.

Items.extra_info: The cause of this potential leak can be determined by performing a visual inspection of the areas around your moisture sensors.  If there are no obvious signs of a leak or if you have any questions, please contact Flo Support.
Items.name: Floor Moisture Detection Positive
Items.friendly_description: your Flo device detected floor moisture. Flo has shut off your water on your behalf.

message_templates.name: General System Error
message_templates.friendly_description: On ##INCIDENT_DATE_TIME##, we noticed your Flo Device may not be working properly. To troubleshoot, we recommend restarting your Flo Device by going to the System Settings in the Settings section of the Flo mobile app, then clearing this alert. If you see this alert again, please contact Flo support as your device may have malfunctioned.

message_templates.name: Small Drip Detected (2 - Smaller)
message_templates.friendly_description: On ##INCIDENT_DATE_TIME##, a small drip was detected during your Health Test. Don’t panic - it’s likely a running toilet or faucet that wasn’t closed all the way. Check all the fixtures in your house and make sure they're tightly closed and have proper sealing.

message_templates.name: Small Drip Detected (1 - Small)
message_templates.friendly_description: On ##INCIDENT_DATE_TIME##, a small drip was detected during your Health Test. Don’t panic - it’s likely a running toilet or faucet that wasn’t closed all the way. Check all the fixtures in your house and make sure they're tightly closed and have proper sealing.
